page.title: 09Interview with Mrs Thornton
page.content: Mrs Thornton has lived in Eastoft for 40 years.There is one shop which is the Post Office.The Post Office sells general things.A butcher,a baker and a fishman comes round selling things in their vans. There are not alot of yearly events.There used to be a gala but that has died out.Now there is a harvest festival,the church fete and a garden party. The main change is the farming.In the old days everything revolved round farming,but now lots of people have jobs at Scunthorpe.There are few animals around Eastoft.It is mainly an arable area.There are no sheep because of the flat wet land which would cause foot rot. Eastoft has now more ameneties including the sewerage processing which was laid on 10 years ago.
